Grill client configuration

The configuration parameters and their default values
No. Property Name Default Value Description
1 grill.base.path grillapi default grill server base path
2 grill.dbname default Default grill database
3 grill.host localhost Grill server hostname
4 grill.metastore.resource.path metastore resource path to query webservice
5 grill.persistent.resultset false Whether to enable persistent resultset for queries
6 grill.port 9999 Default Grill server port
7 grill.query.resource.path queryapi resource path to query webservice
8 grill.session.resource.path session resource path to session webservice
9 grill.user.name anonymous Grill client user name
10 grill.user.password Grill client user password
